name: Norwalk
shortDescription: A family-oriented city with parks, shopping, and convenient access to Los Angeles and Orange County.
fullDescription: Norwalk is a vibrant city in southeast Los Angeles County known for its community parks, diverse shopping centers, and family-friendly atmosphere. Offering a suburban feel with easy access to major freeways, Norwalk is ideal for commuters working in Los Angeles or Orange County. The city hosts annual community events and provides quality schools and recreational facilities.
heroImageAlt: Suburban street with trees and houses in Norwalk

neighborhoods.description: Known for parks, historic sites, and community events.

neighborhoods.name: La Mirada
neighborhoods.description: Residential city known for parks, schools, and family activities.

highlights.title: Norwalk Regional Park
highlights.description: Popular park with sports fields, playgrounds, and picnic areas.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Playground and green fields at Norwalk Regional Park

highlights.title: Norwalk Mall
highlights.description: Shopping destination with retail stores, dining, and entertainment.

highlights.title: Veterans Park
highlights.description: Community park with sports courts, walking trails, and event spaces.

highlights.title: Annual Norwalk Fiesta
highlights.description: A festive community event with live music, food, and activities.

faqs.question: What kind of community is Norwalk?
faqs.answer: Norwalk is known for its family-friendly neighborhoods, parks, and shopping options.

faqs.question: How is the real estate market in Norwalk?
faqs.answer: The real estate market offers affordable homes and condos with good value for families.

faqs.question: What recreational options are available in Norwalk?
faqs.answer: Norwalk Regional Park and Veterans Park offer sports and outdoor activities for all ages.

faqs.question: Is commuting easy from Norwalk?
faqs.answer: Yes, with close access to I-5, I-605, and Metrolink rail services, commuting is convenient.
